name: Easy Supermarket Dough
description: A very easy dough recipe involving the premade dough balls you can find at your local market.
instructions: Open the plastic bag the doughball comes in and leave out on the counter for 3-4 hours (more if frozen)
Lightly grease your hands and worksurface before removing the doughball from it's plastic bag. Gently work the dough into a ball shape and let sit in a covered greased bowl for at least an hour.
notes: Usually I find purchasing the dough at least a day in advanced is best as most markets get the dough shipped in frozen.
